 35namespace vsip_csl
 36{
 37namespace dispatcher
 38{
 39template<>
 40struct List<op::fir>
 41{
 42  typedef Make_type_list<be::intel_ipp,
 43			 be::cml,
 44			 be::opt,
 45			 be::cvsip>::type type;
 46};
 47
 48
 49/// The following specializations are required since the generic form would
 50/// pass the first argument (aligned_array) by value, thus loosing ownership.
 51template <typename T, symmetry_type S, obj_state C, typename B>
 52struct Profile_nop_policy<
 53  op::fir, 
 54  impl::Ref_counted_ptr<impl::Fir_backend<T, S, C> >(impl::aligned_array<T>,
 55						     length_type,
 56						     length_type,
 57						     length_type,
 58						     unsigned,
 59						     alg_hint_type),
 60  B>
 61{
 62  Profile_nop_policy(impl::aligned_array<T> const &,
 63                     length_type,
 64                     length_type,
 65                     length_type,
 66                     unsigned,
 67                     alg_hint_type) {}
 68};
 69
 70template <typename T, symmetry_type S, obj_state C, typename B>
 71struct Profile_policy<
 72  op::fir,
 73  impl::Ref_counted_ptr<impl::Fir_backend<T, S, C> >(impl::aligned_array<T>,
 74						     length_type,
 75						     length_type,
 76						     length_type,
 77						     unsigned,
 78						     alg_hint_type),
 79  B>
 80{
 81  typedef impl::profile::Scope<Profile_feature<op::fir>::value> scope_type;
 82  typedef Evaluator<op::fir, B,
 83		    impl::Ref_counted_ptr<impl::Fir_backend<T, S, C> >(impl::aligned_array<T>,
 84								       length_type,
 85								       length_type,
 86								       length_type,
 87								       unsigned,
 88								       alg_hint_type)>
 89  evaluator_type;
 90
 91  Profile_policy(impl::aligned_array<T> const &k,
 92                 length_type ks,
 93                 length_type is,
 94                 length_type d,
 95                 unsigned n,
 96                 alg_hint_type h)
 97    : scope(evaluator_type::name(), evaluator_type::op_count(ks, is, d, n, h)) {}
 98
 99  scope_type scope;  
100};
101
102} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
103} // namespace vsip_csl
104
105namespace vsip
106{
107namespace impl
108{
109namespace diag_detail
110{
111struct Diagnose_fir;
112} // namespace vsip::impl::diag_detail
113} // namespace vsip::impl
114#endif
115
116template <typename  T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
117          symmetry_type S = nonsym,
118          obj_state C = state_save,
119          unsigned  N = 0,
120          alg_hint_type H = alg_time>
121class Fir : impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal>
122{
123  typedef impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal> accumulator_type;
124  typedef impl::Fir_backend<T, S, C> backend;
125  typedef impl::Ref_counted_ptr<backend> backend_ptr;
126public:
127  static symmetry_type const symmetry = S;
128  static obj_state const continuous_filter = C;
129 
130  template <typename BlockT>
131  Fir(const_Vector<T,BlockT> kernel,
132      length_type input_size,
133      length_type decimation = 1)
134    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
135    : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<1, T>::tag(
136			 "Fir", input_size), 
137                       impl::signal_detail::Op_count_fir<T>::value
138                       (backend::order(kernel.size()), input_size, decimation)),
139#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
140      backend_(new impl::cvsip::Fir_impl<T, S, C>
141               (copy(kernel.block()), kernel.size(), input_size, decimation,
142                N, H))
143#else
144      backend_(vsip_csl::dispatch<vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fir, backend_ptr>
145               (copy(kernel.block()), kernel.size(), input_size, decimation,
146                N, H))
147#endif
148  {}
149  // This constructor is used only by the C-VSIPL bindings,
150  // as there we unpack the kernel prior to constructing the Fir object.
151  Fir(impl::aligned_array<T> kernel,
152      length_type kernel_size,
153      length_type input_size,
154      length_type decimation = 1)
155    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
156    : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<1, T>::tag(
157			 "Fir", input_size), 
158                       impl::signal_detail::Op_count_fir<T>::value
159                       (backend::order(kernel_size), input_size, decimation)),
160#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
161      backend_(new impl::cvsip::Fir_impl<T, S, C>
162               (kernel, kernel_size, input_size, decimation,
163                N, H))
164#else
165      backend_(vsip_csl::dispatch<vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fir, backend_ptr>
166               (kernel, kernel_size, input_size, decimation,
167                N, H))
168#endif
169  {}
170  Fir(Fir const &fir)
171    : accumulator_type(fir),
172      backend_(continuous_filter == state_save ?
173               backend_ptr(fir.backend_->clone()) : // deep copy
174               fir.backend_)                        // shallow copy
175  {}
176  ~Fir() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
177  Fir &operator= (Fir const &fir)
178  {
179    accumulator_type::operator= (fir);
180    if (continuous_filter == state_save)
181      backend_ = backend_ptr(fir.backend_->clone()); // deep copy
182    else 
183      backend_ = fir.backend_;                       // shallow copy
184    return *this;
185  }
186
187  length_type kernel_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
188  { return backend_->kernel_size();}
189  length_type filter_order() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
190  { return backend_->filter_order();}
191  length_type input_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
192  { return backend_->input_size();}
193  length_type output_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
194  { return backend_->output_size();}
195  vsip::length_type decimation() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
196  { return backend_->decimation();}
197  obj_state continuous_filtering() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return C;}
198
199  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
200  length_type
201  operator()(const_Vector<T, Block0> in, Vector<T, Block1> out) VSIP_NOTHROW
202  {
203    using vsip::impl::Block_layout;
204    using vsip::impl::Adjust_layout_complex;
205    using vsip::impl::Cmplx_inter_fmt;
206
207    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
208    assert(in.size() == backend_->input_size());
209    assert(out.size() == backend_->output_size());
210
211    typedef typename Block_layout<Block0>::layout_type LP0;
212    typedef typename Block_layout<Block1>::layout_type LP1;
213    typedef typename Adjust_layout_complex<Cmplx_inter_fmt, LP0>::type use_LP0;
214    typedef typename Adjust_layout_complex<Cmplx_inter_fmt, LP1>::type use_LP1;
215
216    impl::Ext_data<Block0, use_LP0> ext_in(in.block());
217    impl::Ext_data<Block1, use_LP1> ext_out(out.block());
218    return backend_->apply(ext_in.data(), ext_in.stride(0), ext_in.size(0),
219                           ext_out.data(), ext_out.stride(0), ext_out.size(0));
220  }
221
222  void reset() VSIP_NOTHROW { backend_->reset();}
223
224  float impl_performance(char const *what) const VSIP_NOTHROW
225  {
226    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops"))  return this->mflops();
227    else if (!strcmp(what, "time"))  return this->total();
228    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->count();
229    else return 0.f;
230  }
231
232  friend class vsip::impl::diag_detail::Diagnose_fir;
233private:
234  template <typename Block>
235  static impl::aligned_array<T> copy(Block const &block)
236  {
237    impl::aligned_array<T> array(block.size());
238    Dense<1, T> tmp(block.size(), array.get());
239    tmp.admit(false);
240    impl::assign<1>(tmp, block);
241    tmp.release();
242    return array;
243  }
244
245  backend_ptr backend_;
246};
247
248} // namespace vsip
249
250#endif // VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_FIR_HPP
